text: William Vollie Alexander Jr. (born January 16, 1934) is a retired American politician. He represented the U.S. state of Arkansas in the United States House of Representatives from 1969 to 1993. He was promoted to the post of Chief Deputy Majority Whip. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Arkansas Category:Politicians from Memphis, Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Memphis, Tennessee
title: William Vollie Alexander Jr.
